description: Users may experience unexpected freezes when using Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 118.0.2088.46. This symptom can manifest as unresponsive browser behavior or delayed response times, particularly when interacting with certain web pages that leverage Chromium's blink history component. It is crucial for system administrators to ensure their users are updated to the latest version to mitigate these issues, as documented in KB-118.0.2088.46.
